text: Solomon, 1,000plan mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapaniba, ko 100plan mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapaniba, ko jasba, ko Israelian gumazir dapaniba bar moghɨra, ko men ikɨzibar gumazir dapaniba bar men dia. Ezɨ gumazir kaba iza Israelian gumazamiziba ko bar moghɨra uari akuvazɨ, Solomon Godɨn akamɨn gun me mɨgei.
